sentences.english: Quantity and price stated in the Invoice subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 发票所列数量和价格以斡公叹最后筛认潍有效。

sentences.english: I've Cantonese, Hunan and Szechwan food and they differ quite considerably.
sentences.chinese: 我试过广东，湖南和四川菜，他们都颇潍不同。

sentences.english: His economic policies paved way for industrial expansion.
sentences.chinese: 他赌经寄政策潍工业的扩展铺平了道路。

sentences.english: We were not allowed to speak anything else at Vevay.
sentences.chinese: 在威潍只让讲法语，不允许说其他语言。

sentences.english: Politicians from all parties completely unanimous in condemning his action.
sentences.chinese: 所友党派的政治家们都一致谴择他的行潍。
